overview: The Best of Ramon Mendez is nearly three hours of eight scenes from eight movies which find the good looking Latino hunk in four duos and four trios (one underwater!) with men who often look just like him. Plus some slick twinks and youths, carrying on in a john, a jungle, a park, a pool, a bar, a bathhouse, a bizarre bedroom, a back alley, and backstage at a go-go bar! Scenes are all beautifully shot and the men all beautifully shot. Movies excerpted are 8 Inches from Brazil, Jungle Cruisers, Just between Us, Poolside Heat, Bananas from Brazil, Underwater, Doing the Tricks, and 8 Inches from Brazil 2!
title: The Best of Ramon Mendez 1
